system.unidentifiedDesc: The flask or vial holds a swirling and mysterious concoction inside.
system.description:
The magical effect selectively enhances specific types of characters. It has no effect on elves, clerics, magic-users, mystics, or thieves. However, fighters, dwarves, halflings, or normal individuals (or monsters) gain enhanced abilities based on their current level:

Normal man: Becomes a 4th-level fighter
Levels 1-3: Gains 3 levels or Hit Dice
Levels 4-7: Gains 2 levels or Hit Dice
Levels 8-10: Gains 1 level or Hit Die
Levels 11+: No effect

All wounds taken during the effect's duration—including energy drains—are subtracted from the temporary enhanced hit points or levels.

It lasts for 7-12 turns (1d6+6), with the exact duration known only to the DM.
